postAction.text: {0}: The speech is over, and the party is beginning.

RitualBehaviorDef.letterText: {SPEAKER_labelShort} is giving a {RITUAL_labelIndef}. \nIf all goes well, listeners will feel inspired, and gain respect for {SPEAKER_labelShort}. If it goes poorly, the speech will do social damage. Positive effects are reduced for non-{IDEOMEMBERS}.

li.label: sacrifice
li.missingDesc: an animal with body size of at least 0.8

li.label: cutter
li.missingDesc: the person who performs the scarification

li.label: cutter
li.missingDesc: the person who performs the blinding

spectatorFilter.description: Spectators must be willing to watch the execution.
